mapper.select: select a.device_code, a.id, b.id as device_id, b.name as device_name, dt.name as device_type_name, dt.code as device_type_code, b.line_code, cl.line_name, cs.station_code, cs.station_name from fault_device a LEFT JOIN device b ON a.device_code = b.code LEFT JOIN device_type dt on b.device_type_code = dt.code LEFT JOIN cs_line cl on b.line_code = cl.line_code LEFT JOIN cs_station cs on b.station_code = cs.station_code where a.fault_code = #{faultCode}
